calling_intervallist.description: interval list used to aid scattering HaplotypeCaller

contamination_bed.description: .bed file for markers used in this analysis

contamination_ud.description: .UD matrix file from SVD result of genotype matrix

coverage_intervallist.description: An interval list file that contains the positions to restrict the wgs metrics assessment

cram_fasta.description: If aligning from cram, need to provided reference used to generate that cram

cutadapt_min_len.description: If adapter trimming, discard reads/read-pairs where the read length is less than this value. Set to 0 to turn off

cutadapt_quality_base.description: If adapter trimming, use this value as the base quality score. Defaults to 33 but very old reads might need this value set to 64

cutadapt_quality_cutoff.description: If adapter trimming, remove bases from the 3'/5' that fail to meet this cutoff value

cutadapt_r1_adapter.description: If read1 reads have an adapter, provide regular 3' adapter sequence here to remove it from read1

cutadapt_r2_adapter.description: If read1 reads have an adapter, provide regular 3' adapter sequence here to remove it from read2

evaluation_intervallist.description: Target intervals to restrict gvcf metric analysis (for VariantCallingMetrics)

knownsites.description: List of files containing known polymorphic sites used to exclude regions around known polymorphisms from analysis

output_basename.description: String to use as the base for output filenames

reference_tar.description: Tar file containing a reference fasta and, optionally, its complete set of associated indexes (samtools, bwa, and picard)

wgs_or_wxs.description: Is the sample: WGS or WXS?
